Famosos que podr√≠an ser nuestros pr√≥ximos congresistas
Mariella Zanetti, el Zorro Zupe, y diferentes artistas de la far√°ndula peruana podr√≠an tener una curul en el nuevo Congreso.
07 Nov 2019, 11:05 by Brenda Quiroz























Con la disoluci√≥n del Congreso de la Rep√∫blica, empezaremos a ver nuevos rostros en el Parlamento, y entre ellos podr√≠amos tener a diferentes artistas peruanos como Mariella Zanetti, el Zorro Zupe y muchos m√°s.



¬°Echa un vistazo a nuestra lista!
1. Mariella Zanetti
La ex vedette y actriz Mariella Zanetti revel√≥ a trav√©s de su cuenta de Instagram que desea ser congresista.
‚ÄúQuiero postular al congreso ya no quiero ser espectadora, me cans√© de decir y no hacer, me cans√© de luchar por 15 a√±os contra un poder judicial corrupto, ineficiente, lento con procesos inoficiosos, me cans√© de ver madres mendigando los derechos de sus hijos, me cans√© de ver llorar a ni√±os mendigando por un apellido, ropa o comida, me cans√© de la indiferencia ante los abusos y feminicidios, me cans√© de la mediocridad con que tratan la salud mental y seguridad ciudadana, quiero legislar para y por mi pa√≠s pero no quiero hacerlo sola, quiero contar con el apoyo de todos los peruanos que nos sacamos la mugre por salir adelante, que nos levantamos temprano para tener una vida mejor, quiero contar con todos los que queremos un pa√≠s decente y seguro para nuestros hijos, quiero trabajar en conjunto, cada idea, necesidad, proyecto, problem√°tica y soluciones, por qu√© es trabajo de todos querer y tener un Per√∫ üáµüá™ mejor.‚Äù, escribi√≥ Mariella en su red social.



2. El Zorro Zupe
El Zorro Zupe revel√≥ que ha recibido propuestas para postular al Congreso y que le encantar√≠a, pero por ahora no se siente preparado.
‚ÄúYo recib√≠ un par de propuestas para llegar al Congreso. Me gustar√≠a, pero ahorita no me siento preparado para eso", indic√≥.
3. Susy D√≠az
Nuestra querida excongresista Susy D√≠az revel√≥ que podr√≠a volver al Parlamento:

"En el periodo pasado me invitaron partidos pol√≠ticos grandes, pero no acept√©, porque quer√≠a mi paz. Ahora s√≠ lo har√©, mientras ya me preparo para darle al ciudadano una mejor calidad de vida.

Cuando fui congresista present√© 120 proyectos de ley y me aprobaron 34. Yo presentaba mociones para que no suba la luz, el agua, siempre defendiendo la econom√≠a de la poblaci√≥n. Yo no ir√© a dormir al Congreso" expres√≥ a 'Per√∫ 21'.
¬†
4. Monique Pardo
‚ÄúYo vengo a dar y no a robar... Quiero ser congresista por los ni√±os, por el trabajo de los peruanos y por la justicia‚Äù ‚ÄúEsto me lo estoy tomando en serio y es muy dif√≠cil ser pol√≠tico cuando la pol√≠tica da asco‚Äù, indic√≥ Monique Pardo.



5. La Tigresa del Oriente
Hace algunos meses, ‚ÄòLa Tigresa del Oriente‚Äô expres√≥ que desea estar en la Pol√≠tica por el bien del pueblo en donde naci√≥.

‚Äú√öltimamente he pensado seriamente en postularme como congresista. Me encantar√≠a de verdad estar en la pol√≠tica para trabajar por mi tierra que me vio nacer. Para mi selva, no solamente Iquitos, sino toda la regi√≥n s√≠ necesita un apoyo de alguna autoridad que se preocupe por ellos‚Äù




Andres Hurtado quiere ser Presidente
El c√≥mico expres√≥: ‚ÄúLleg√≥ el momento‚Äù, mencion√≥ Andr√©s Hurtado en Instagram, al salir con una banda presidencia sonriendo y teniendo al ¬†Palacio de Gobierno detr√°s de √©l.
¬øCrees que alguno de estos personajes llegue a ser Pol√≠tico? ¬øVotar√≠as por alguno de ellos?
¬†

text:
Famous who could be our next congressmen
Mariella Zanetti, Zorro Zupe, and different artists of the Peruvian show business could have a seat in the new Congress.
07 Nov 2019, 11:05 by Brenda Quiroz























With the dissolution of the Congress of the Republic, we will begin to see new faces in Parliament, and among them we could have different Peruvian artists such as Mariella Zanetti, Zorro Zupe and many more.



Check out our list!
1. Mariella Zanetti
Former Vedette and actress Mariella Zanetti revealed through her Instagram account that she wants to be a congressman.
‚ÄúI want to run for the congress I don't want to be a spectator anymore, I got tired of saying and not doing, I got tired of fighting for 15 years against a corrupt, inefficient, slow judiciary with harmless processes, I got tired of seeing mothers begging for their children's rights , I got tired of seeing children crying begging for a last name, clothes or food, I got tired of the indifference to the abuses and feminicides, I got tired of the mediocrity with which they treat mental health and citizen security, I want to legislate for and for my country but I do not want to do it alone, I want to have the support of all Peruvians who get the dirt out of us, to get up early to have a better life, I want to have everyone who wants a decent and safe country for our children, I want to work together, every idea, need, project, problem and solutions, why it is everyone's job to want and have a better Peru. ‚ÄùMariella wrote in her social network.



2. The Zorro Zupe
Zorro Zupe revealed that he has received proposals to run for Congress and that he would love it, but for now he does not feel prepared.
‚ÄúI received a couple of proposals to reach the Congress. I would like to, but right now I don't feel prepared for that, "he said.
3. Susy D√≠az
Our beloved former congressman Susy D√≠az revealed that he could return to Parliament:

"In the past period I was invited by large political parties, but I did not accept, because I wanted my peace. Now I will, while I am preparing to give the citizen a better quality of life.

When I was a congressman, I presented 120 bills and they approved 34. I presented motions so that the light, the water did not rise, always defending the economy of the population. I will not go to Congress to sleep, "he said to 'Peru 21'.

4. Monique Pardo
"I come to give and not to steal ... I want to be a congressman for the children, for the work of the Peruvians and for justice" "I am taking this seriously and it is very difficult to be political when politics is disgusting" , said Monique Pardo.



5. The Tigress of the East
A few months ago, ‚ÄòLa Tigresa del Oriente‚Äô said he wants to be in politics for the good of the town where he was born.

‚ÄúLately I have seriously thought about running as a congressman. I would really love to be in politics to work for my land that saw me born. For my jungle, not only Iquitos, but the entire region does need support from some authority that cares about them. ‚Äù




Andres Hurtado wants to be President
The comedian said: ‚ÄúThe time has come,‚Äù said Andr√©s Hurtado on Instagram, when he left with a presidential band smiling and having the Government Palace behind him.
Do you think any of these characters become political? Would you vote for any of them?


It may interest you
